website_summaries.verdict: A heavy-duty basketball rack that holds up to 12 balls.
pros: Created using a no-topple design so it won't tip over even if it's hit with a ball
Made from heavy-duty chrome tubing that won't rust
Rubber casters won't leave marks on the court
cons: Some find the material to be of poor quality

customer_reviews.title: Great value for light residential use.
customer_reviews.text: This is simply the best ball rack for the money. There are better quality ones out there, but at significantly higher prices. If for light residential use, this will work fine. If for heavier use (ie school gym), you’ll probably need to look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. Couldn’t figure out why this was so expensive but now I get it... it’s built well and won’t fall apart. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: UVMPT Mom

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: The legs of the cart bow inward making the cart shake when you move it. Going to return this and get a higher quality cart.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Good product for a good price
customer_reviews.text: this was easy to put together and holds all the basketballs that I need it to. It doesn't seem as sturdy as it is but that doesn't matter as it was a very good price for what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: E.B.

customer_reviews.title: Not Great for the Price
customer_reviews.text: For the price, I expected the wheels would lock into place. My 13 year old doesn't love it, but it is sufficient for his practicing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: This really worked out well. My kids use it for shooting practice. There isn’t a way of locking wheels and places and times I can be a pain. But that said good product good value
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: lol very easy assemby
customer_reviews.text: Love the rack. The white color is nice and it seems sturdy. I research many sites and Amazon and this seller had the cheapest price for the rack we needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: Works fantastically! My boyfriend loves it and has all his basketballs on it! I totally recommend to everyone!!
customer_reviews.author: Litsy n

customer_reviews.title: Great cart for those who have a lot of balls
customer_reviews.text: Great stand for the price! The kids are constantly jamming balls on and off, but it’s stood up to their abuse very well so far. And for its size, it’s actually quite compact and doesn’t take up a lot of real estate in the garage. Very happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Huskie

customer_reviews.title: Great product and great price!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought 3 of these ball racks for our Parasport Wheelchair basketball team and they work great! Made very well They roll easily Light and sturdy
customer_reviews.author: ck

customer_reviews.title: Great storage for balls
customer_reviews.text: Great for storage. It’s not bulky and can fit in a small space. A bit overpriced, But we like it.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Simple concept and easy assembly.
customer_reviews.text: Great for keeping all the kids basketballs in one spot. Easy to roll in and out of the garage for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Carl

customer_reviews.title: This is Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I just wish we had gotten one of these sooner. It was easy to put together and the kids roll it in and out of the garage with ease. It keeps all the basketballs and soccer balls organized. I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Nadeau

customer_reviews.title: Awesome quality, built to last, easy assembly, price could be lower 😜
customer_reviews.text: GREAT rack, very sturdy, 5 min assembly time with no instructions, just screw the poles in and snap the wheels on. Very good quality, strong metal, took a while going through reviews to pick this, the price isn't so easy to accept, but overall worth it for the sturdyness and look
customer_reviews.author: B Shi

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This item is great to keep all your basketballs organized. You can move it easily from place to place.
customer_reviews.author: Jones Family

customer_reviews.title: Quick assembly
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. My son was using it 15 minutes after it was delivered.
customer_reviews.author: Sound Mixer Spock

customer_reviews.title: Great storage!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to put together and helps my kids have easy access to getting and then putting away their balls.
customer_reviews.author: Florin

customer_reviews.title: Great ball cart
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, easy to assemble & does not tip easily. We use it to hold soccer balls too.
customer_reviews.author: IndyJen

customer_reviews.title: quick delivery and easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: High quality, quick delivery and easy to put together. I had it all together is l0 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio

customer_reviews.title: Great Product.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Helped us to organize our garage to get all the balls off the ground. Easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for using at home.... not just the gym.
customer_reviews.text: It’s holding up to 3 kids dragging this thing in and out of the garage daily! Easy to put together! Wish I would have made the purchase sooner instead of kicking balls out of my way every day.
customer_reviews.author: william

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. My 11 year old son put it together in 15 minutes. I will update my review after it is used for a month.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Great ball rack
customer_reviews.text: Decent ball rack for the price. My son uses it for basketball collection.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Lo Pic

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: The frame bent and cracked after 3 weeks and it needs to be thrown out. Total piece of garbage don’t wast your money on it.
customer_reviews.author: John Villanueva

customer_reviews.title: Confused
customer_reviews.text: One side of the stand did not have the pre drilled holes!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase! So nice to have all of the ...
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase! So nice to have all of the basketball and soccer balls out of a big container and easily accessible. It is able to hold rollerblades and baseball gloves for easy access as well! Heavier than I expected and well made.
customer_reviews.author: VJPartyof5

customer_reviews.title: easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: easy to put together and seems to be working wonderfully.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Kalicki

customer_reviews.title: Love this!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Really good quality and took 10 min to put together. Such a great buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: A. Runyon

customer_reviews.title: Great for garage or shed
customer_reviews.text: Great for organizing my shed. Easy to put together, took me minutes
customer_reviews.author: Christine Harte

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly/ good quality
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of shopping around on amazon for one of these. There were lots of mixed reviews and high prices. This one had the best reviews and best price. I am very happy with how easy it was to put together. The quality of the materials are great too! We haven’t got to use it much with it being - temps outside right now... I bought it for our garage at home. So far I don’t think I will be disappointed though. It made a great Christmas present for my boys to share
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing screws
customer_reviews.text: Everything was fine except it was missing some screws, so how am i suppose to put it together🤔🤦
customer_reviews.author: SGG

customer_reviews.title: Awesome storage!
customer_reviews.text: It’s awesome!! It holds a lot and makes it easy for the kids to get to all of them (unlike the bin they were in).
customer_reviews.author: Chase A.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Works great to keep all the basketballs in place in our garage
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very durable
customer_reviews.text: this product delivers in every way . very easy to build and move around with rollers!
customer_reviews.author: david dorsey

customer_reviews.title: Balls managing rack!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this item for my grandson. He lines it for arranging his many rolling balls.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy. Nice to have all our balls in one place. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: R Hausman

product_meta.title: BSN Sports Ball Cart Wide Base (12 Balls)
product_meta.description: The whole Basketball team can begin warming up and practicing their shooting, passing and dribbling skills when this wide-body ball cart is rolled onto the court. When placed on the sidelines, the wide, no-topple base ensures wild throws and shots won't knock the cart over and spill balls onto the hardwood. The cart can be Wheeled right from the equipment room to the court thanks to hard rubber casters, which make this cart quick and easy to maneuver without leaving marks or scratches on the gym floor. Heavy-duty chromed steel tubing withstands the wear and tear of daily practices tiered storage can hold enough official-size basketballs to equip the entire team Wheeled design makes it easy to transport the cart from the equipment room to the court and back again non-marring hard rubber casters won't mark up gym floors, keeping the hardwood clean for game day wide, no-topple base prevents the cart from being accidentally knocked over and spilling stored balls
feature_bullets: Heavy duty White powdercoated steel tubing
Non-marring, hard rubber casters with a wide, no-topple base
Designed for easy storage and removal of balls
